category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCIC_co_warn_on_linked_doc
preference.preference_description: Display a warning message when a Check Out is performed on a source object that is linked to targets in the Teamcenter database. The list of link types (link between a source object and its target) is defined in the TCIC_co_warn_link_types preference. By default, if the preference is not defined or if the preference is set to true, a warning message is displayed Possible values: - true: Display a warning message. - false: No warning.
